### [Converting other types of color objects](/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/init(_:)#Converting-other-types-of-color-objects)

[`init?(cgColor: CGColor)`](/documentation/appkit/nscolor/init(cgcolor:))Creates a color object using the specified Core Graphics color.[`init(CIColor: CIColor)`](/documentation/appkit/nscolor/init(cicolor:))Creates a color object from the specified Core Image color.
